New Residents
New Residents
White Oak offers a friendly, fun, and safe community with a nationally recognized school district for excellence. We offer two
[parks](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/parks)
with amenities that include a splash pad and concession stand, remote control rock crawling park, dog park, pond, bike/walking trail, a 9-hole disc golf course, and pavilions with park benches and grills.
It is our goal to make your transition to White Oak an easy and pleasant experience by offering the following resources. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to call White Oak City Hall at
[(903) 759-3936](javascript:;)
.
Thank you for choosing White Oak as your home!
The City of White Oak supplies its citizens with water, sewer, and sanitation service. There are a few areas of the City that sewer service is not available. In order to set up new service, there are multiple forms that must be filled out and returned accompanied with a $125 water meter deposit. When service is disconnected, the final bill will be deducted from the deposit with any amount remaining mailed to your new address; a bill with any amount owed will be mailed to your new address.

* [New Service Application](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/utilities?def2=45CwNIZwbOCY4pC0DGjNUg%3D%3D)
* [Service Agreement](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/utilities?def2=3yvAYRyV39DHxVS0NDp2Vw%3D%3D)
* [Confidentiality Form (optional)](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/utilities?def2=jhKEmLd8%2FQ7AsP4ABFUVkA%3D%3D)
* [Automatic Bank Draft (optional)](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/utilities?def2=ofzO6ad5csiMl3092d8G3A%3D%3D)

New customers may fill out these forms at City Hall, return the forms by fax (903) 297-3452 or by email to
[utilitiesdept@cityofwhiteoak.com](javascript:;)
. The water deposit may be paid for over the phone; although a small fee from GovPayNet will apply.
[**Building Permits & Inspections**](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/buildingandpermits)
For new service, please go to the
[Utility Billing](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/utilities)
page for forms, new service instructions, and rates
The majority of White Oak is served by
[AEP/SWEPCO](javascript:;)
. If your property is not serviced by SWEPCO, then it will be
[Upshur Rural Cooperative](javascript:;)
.
The only natural gas provided in the City is
[CenterPoint Energy](javascript:;)
.
Sanitation is provided by
[Republic Services](javascript:;)
and is included in the monthly utility bill. White Oak's trash day is on Wednesdays. Please see the
[Garbage & Recycling](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/garbage)
page for more information.
**PHONE, CABLE, & INTERNET PROVIDERS**
The main cable provider for White Oak is
[Suddenlink Communications](javascript:;)
. They offer phone, cable, and internet services.
The phone providers for White Oak are
[AT&T](javascript:;)
, and Sparklight. They also provide internet services. However, there are other options available. Please visit the
[Public Utilities Commission](javascript:;)
for all phone companies available.
AT&T also offers their website in
[Spanish](javascript:;)
.
[White Oak Independent School District](javascript:;)
covers the majority of White Oak; however, there are a few properties on the eastern-side of town that are in the
[Pine Tree Independent School District](javascript:;)
.
The City does not require pets to be registered however a household is only allowed to have six dogs or cats, or any combination there of.  Please see the
[Animal Control](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/animalcontrol)
page for more information.
Voter registration is handled through the Gregg County Elections Administrator. All county, state, and federal election information is available at
[greggcountyvotes.com](javascript:;)
. The Gregg County votes website will also have information on where early voting will occur as well as were to vote on Election Day. You must be registered to vote 30 days prior to any election, including the City's General Election, which is held annually in May.
Sales tax and property tax information is available on the
[Finance](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/secretary)
web page. White Oak's sales tax rate is 8.25% and the current ad valorem property tax rate is $0.64204/100 assessed valuation.
![](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/api/blob/viewBlob?i=YusEL%252B1fJxc6Lk2N1diNRziLCbTCckaAYWDO72qJ8EnTdMFbVI78xYUQJ5aBitzJ&s=large)
